title: BRIEF-Equimaxx lowers stake held in Power Price to 11.32 pct after share issue
text:
BRIEF-Equimaxx lowers stake held in Power Price to 11.32 pct after share issue 
Oct 2 Power Price SA : 
* After company's capital increase Equimaxx LLC reduces its stake held in Power Price to 11.32 percent from 15.67 percent 
* The number of Power Price's shares held by Equimaxx has not changed and amounts to 4,075,176 shares Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
